frontmatter.title: Change default or weak account passwords
frontmatter.description: This is especially important with IoT devices which are regularly shipped with the same default passwords which are known to attackers. Make sure you access the settings for new devices and change every default password, and login credentials - you wouldn't want an attacker accessing your every movement through a smart camera.

frontmatter.title: Do not allow applications that are not unsigned, have an invalid signature or do not match your organisations software whitelist.
Ensure appropriate device locking controls - biometric, password or PIN before gaining access to the services. Biometric tests, passwords and PINs.
